statements: DELETE FROM quantum_error_correction WHERE id = 1 AND error_type = 'X';
DELETE FROM quantum_error_correction WHERE error_correction_method = 'Shor-code' AND id = 5;
DELETE FROM QuantumTransmissionLogs WHERE transmission_status = false;
DELETE FROM QuantumErrorCorrection WHERE error_type = 'XOR' AND error_id = 10;
DELETE FROM QuantumTransmissionLogs WHERE receiver_address = 'Alice' AND transmission_status = false;
DELETE FROM QuantumDevices WHERE device_id = (SELECT MAX(device_id) FROM QuantumDevices);
DELETE FROM QuantumDataTransmissionLogs WHERE data_size > 1000 AND success = FALSE;
